#include <iostream>
#include <cstdio>
#include <algorithm>
#include <cmath>
#include <cstring>
#include <set>
using namespace std;
const int K = 200000;

struct event
{
	int id, tim, type;
	bool operator < (const event &x) const
	{
		return tim != x.tim ? tim : type;
	}
};

int T, n, l[K], r[K], c[K], ans[K], maxr[K], cnt;
multiset <int> s;

void solve()
{
	cnt = 0;
	for(int i = 1; i <= n; i++)
	{
		a[++cnt] = (event){i, l[i], 1};
		a[++cnt] = (event){i, r[i], 2};
	}
	memset(maxr, 0, sizeof(int) * (n + 5));
	sort(a + 1, a + cnt + 1);
	for(int i = 1; i <= cnt; i++)
	{
		int u = a[i].id;
		if(a[i].type == 1)
		{
			if(r[u] > maxr[c[u]])
			{
				if(s.find(maxr[c[u]]) != s.end())
				{
					s.erase(s.find(maxr[c[u]]));
				}
				s.insert(r[u]);
				maxr[c[u]] = r[u];
			}
		}
		else
		{
			if(a[i].type == 2)
			{
				if(s.find(maxr[c[u]]) != s.end())
				{
					ans[u] = min(ans[u], max(0, l[u] - *(--s.end()))));
				}
			}
		}
	}
}

int main()
{
	scanf("%d", &T);
	while(T--)
	{
		scanf("%d", &n);
		memset(ans, 0x3f, sizeof(int) * (n + 5));
		for(int i = 1; i <= n; i++) scanf("%d%d%d", &l[i], &r[i], &c[i]);
		solve();
		for(int i = 1; i <= n; i++) printf("%d ", ans[i]);
		printf("\n");
	}
	return 0;
}
